column1: '''Sophisticated Games''' is an international board game publisher, specialising in development and packaging of all book-based [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] games under license from [[Middle-earth Enterprises]]. Sophisticated Games is based in Cambridge UK.
Products related to the [[legendarium]] of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
